forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 16 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Areas Of Fog
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog after midnight. Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon sun casts a warm glow over Downtown San Francisco, with temperatures gently balancing near 70 degrees, inviting a sense of calm and comfort. As the clear azure sky unfolds, the soft percussive whisper of the west-southwest wind dances through the streets, perfectly timed to carry away the lingering warmth of the day. While the sun beams brightly, the city will soon witness the coastal fog rolling in after midnight, creating a gentle veil that will drift into the night, soothing the vibrancy of the day into a tranquil embrace.

With cooler temperatures in the evening reaching around 56 degrees, it’s wise to layer up for the descent into nightfall; consider a light jacket or sweater for those crisp evening strolls. The elusive charm of this city invites you to wander its streets, perhaps discovering a cozy café to enjoy a warm beverage or taking a leisurely walk to breathe in the freshness, all while the soft rustle of fog begins to awaken the sleepy corners of the city. Tonight, as the haze settles, the city promises a scene of haunting beauty, reminiscent of dreams wrapped in sea air and soft whispers.
